name: testing env for ver 7
postStartCommand: sudo apt install -y protobuf-compiler openssl libssl-dev && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | shsource '$HOME/.cargo/env' && git submodule update --init --recursive
postAttachCommand: cd node && npm i && cd rust-client && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && npm test
